title: State popular name
context: ยง5-7 State popular name. The name &ldquo;The Aloha State&rdquo; is adopted, established, and designated as the official &ldquo;popular&rdquo; name for the State, to be effective so long as the legislature of the State does not otherwise provide. [L 1959, JR 1, ยง1; Supp, ยง14-5.1; HRS ยง5-7]
